00041 //
00042 // Basic graphical applet
00043 //
00044 // Thinks about the "common" background (handles transparency stuff & co.)
00045 // Can be a child of any AppletContainer
00046 //
00047 
00048 class KVIRC_API KviToolBarGraphicalApplet : public QToolButton
00049 {
00050         Q_OBJECT
00051 public:
00052         KviToolBarGraphicalApplet(QWidget * par,const char * name = 0);
00053         ~KviToolBarGraphicalApplet();
00054 private:
00055         bool m_bResizeMode;
00056         bool m_bSizeLoaded;
00057         QSize m_sizeHint;
00058 private:
00059         void resizeMemBuffer();
00060 protected:
00061         void setupSizeHint();
00062 
00063         virtual unsigned int loadAppletWidth();
00064         virtual void saveAppletWidth(unsigned int uWidth);
00065         virtual QSize sizeHint() const;
00066         virtual void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *e);
00067         virtual void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *e);
00068         virtual void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *e);
00069 
00070         virtual void paintEvent(QPaintEvent *e);
00071         virtual void drawContents(QPainter * p);
00072         virtual void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *e);
00073 };
